About Me

Hello,

I'm a UX/UI designer and writer based in New York City. I graduated Virginia Commonwealth University in May of 2018 with a BA in English and a minor in Creative writing. and While in school, I worked as a copywriter and editor for multiple student internships in college. Post-graduation, I accepted a position as a Multimedia Editor. On a daily basis, I'm editing multimedia content for clients like Barclays, the LA Rams, and The Executive Office of the President. I'm also currently working on my own UX Design projects in order to expand my UX/UI experience. I'm currently looking for internships as well as full-time and part-time opportunities to develop my skills further and pursue a career in UX Design.


I have always had a passion for visual storytelling and creating narratives that inspire, aid, and reveals new perspectives to readers. As I began to become more interested in expressing these narratives through multiple forms of media, I began to bring my love of graphic design and writing together to tell stories and create digital products that will helps users in a meanningful way.

Resume

I Specialize In

Creating meaningful product narratives as well as creating engaging layouts for websites and mobile aplications
